<<<<<<< HEAD
Twelve plain proposals offered to the honest and faithful officers and souldiers of our English Army.
1 sheet ([1] p.)
Printed by J.C. for Livewel Chapman, London : 1659.
Urging them to stand to or fall with the Good Old Cause, for otherwise "nothing can keep off kingship". Annotation on Thomason copy: "April. 28". Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======

1 sheet ([1] p.)
Printed by J.C. for Livewel Chapman, London : 1659.
Urging them to stand to or fall with the Good Old Cause, for otherwise "nothing can keep off kingship". Annotation on Thomason copy: "April. 28". Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
Livewel Chapman
J.C.
